keys: propagación de la onda de radio

          <title>
            <string language="en">Sky-wave propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Himmel-bewegen Sie Ausbreitung wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ciel-ondulez la propagation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Céu-acene a propagação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cielo-fluttui la propagazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση ουράνιου κύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cielo-agite la propagación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the propagation of sky-waves in the ionosphere. The waves penetrate the ionosphere before total internal reflection occurs for frequencies greater than 30 MHz.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">HF waveband</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio wave propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sky-wave propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sky-waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Ausbreitung 
von in das ionosphere Himmel-wellenartig bewegt. Die Wellen 
dringen das ionosphere ein, bevor interne totalreflexion für 
Frequenzen grösser als 30 MHZ auftritt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la propagation de 
ciel-ondule dans l'ionosphère. Les vagues pénètrent 
l'ionosphère avant que la réflexion interne totale se produise pour 
les fréquences 30 mégahertz plus grands que.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a propagação de 
céu-acena no ionosphere. As ondas penetram o ionosphere antes 
que a reflexão interna total ocorra para freqüências mais 
extremamente de 30 megahertz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che la propagazione 
di cielo-fluttua nello ionosphere. Le onde penetrano lo 
ionosphere prima che la riflessione interna totale si presenti per le 
frequenze più notevolmente di 30 megahertz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διάδοση των ουράνιων 
κυμάτων στην ιονόσφαιρα. Τα κύματα διαπερνούν την 
ιονόσφαιρα προτού να εμφανιστεί η συνολική εσωτερική αντανάκλαση
για τις συχνότητες μεγαλύτερες από 30 MHz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la propagación de 
cielo-agita en el ionosphere. Las ondas penetran el ionosphere 
antes de que la reflexión interna total ocurra para las frecuencias 
mayor de 30 megaciclos.</string>
          </description>
